channel.title: ArravRS - Return of the Legendary RSPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cF66vOs.png[/img] [B]Arrav[/B][B], return of the legendary RSPS.[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jchuHax.png[/img][url=http://arravrs.com/index.html]http://arravrs.com/index.html[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aOVfknV.png[/img][url=http://arravrs.com/community/]http://arravrs.com/community/[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/S0vwpL4.png[[/img][url=http://arravrs.com/loader.jar]arravrs.com/loader.jar[/url]
ArravRS is the original Arrav that strives to make it big this time. The server may not be flawless, but we hope you will come with us on the path to flawless. We have some of the most unique content you won't find anywhere else. We also offer 20+ bosses, 10+ minigames, Anti-Scam Dicing & Flower game, perfect Player killing system, and MUCH MORE!
We are constantly focusing on what our community wants. Being as active as possible and caring about ArravPS is a guarantee from the staff team that our players will notice. So what are you waiting for? Come check us out and experience the absolute best.[/ADMIN]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nD6Yse6zJBU
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pkD456e.png[/img]
[COLOR=#add8e6]Over 20 challenging Bosses. Over 10 enjoyable Minigames. Dicing and Flowergame. Cool Donator benefits. Nex boss. All skills are fully working. Fully working Godwars. 4 working quests. Client configurations. Unique slayer with many dungeons. Flawless Combat. Clan chat with manage option.
[/COLOR]

item.title: ArravRS - Return of the Legendary RSPS
item.dc:creator: @rin_okumura rin okumura
item.description:
@rin_okumura wrote:

Fortitude:

Don’t look to bad. But you say the combat is flawless when in your thread it shows you 1 hitting a noob in the wild with dclaws special 5 squares away from him. You aren’t even close to melee distance.

Usually is like that. even in real rs.

Read full topic
item.source: ArravRS - Return of the Legendary RSPS

@Abdi2400 wrote:

[CENTER]
Arrav, return of the legendary RSPS.

http://arravrs.com/index.html
http://arravrs.com/community/
arravrs.com/loader.jar

ArravRS is the original Arrav that strives to make it big this time. The server may not be flawless, but we hope you will come with us on the path to flawless. We have some of the most unique content you won’t find anywhere else. We also offer 20+ bosses, 10+ minigames, Anti-Scam Dicing & Flower game, perfect Player killing system, and MUCH MORE!

We are constantly focusing on what our community wants. Being as active as possible and caring about ArravPS is a guarantee from the staff team that our players will notice. So what are you waiting for? Come check us out and experience the absolute best.[/ADMIN]

[COLOR=#add8e6]Over 20 challenging Bosses.
Over 10 enjoyable Minigames.
Dicing and Flowergame.
Cool Donator benefits.
Nex boss.
All skills are fully working.
Fully working Godwars.
4 working quests.
Client configurations.
Unique slayer with many dungeons.
Flawless Combat.
Clan chat with manage option.

[/COLOR]
